alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Marcell, or 25 miles northwest of Hibbing, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
